name: Ice Cube Challenge
description:
Ice Cube Challenge is an endless survival game, that with a retro style, challenges you to survive as much as you can, moving through blocks, picking ice and trying not to fall to the lava pit.

In the game you can move orthogonally with WASD or the direction arrows, the character moves in that direction when you press a key, and you can’t decide to change your direction before you hit a wall, items appear randomly and are destroyed when touched, ice gives you stamina, don’t stop you and give you score, pits make you lose instantly.

The interesting part of this game is that you have to think what to do before doing it, and makes you adapt to the situation.
